name: QR Code Reader : QR Scanner & Barcode Scanner
description: Scan All QR Code Types You Need! QR Code Reader : QR Scanner & Barcode Scanner free app is simple and powerful tool which allows you to read & scan all QR code types and barcode. To scan a QR code or barcode, open the app, move the camera over the code and thats it! QR Code Reader app can scan and read all QR code types including text, URL, ISBN, contact, calendar, email, location, Wi-Fi and many other formats.  Generate QR Code and Barcode! QR Code Generator feature allows you generate your own QR Code or Barcode easily. You can save generated QR codes and barcodes on your device or you can share it with your friends.  Customizable Settings!  Vibrate on QR Code Scan. If you enable this feature, your device will vibrate when the application scans a QR code or barcode.  Autofocus on QR Code & Barcode Scan  Open URL Automatically on QR Code Scan. If you activate this feature when app scanning a QR code, if the code contains a website URL, you will automatically be taken to the site. For other formats such as phone numbers, email addresses, or contact info, you will be prompted to take the appropriate action.  Features of QR Code Reader :  Free application (free qr reader app).   Powerful QR decode speed (Fast qr reading).  QR code reader and scanner.  Decode & encrypt your QR Code and Barcode( QR Code / Barcode Reader & Generator).  You can use QR & Barcode Scanner to scan coupons / coupon codes to receive discounts and save some money.  Scan QR code & Barcode & flashcode from photo in the gallery can be done in short time.  QRcode generator allow you to encrypt personal information, create codes for messages, wifi, phone numbers and location. (Connect WIFI hotspot, find location)  Create QR code for locations and share it with your friends.  Create QR code for contacts and share it with your friends.  QRcode scanner does not need Internet connection to scan QR Code / Barcode  QR code reader app saves your generated and scanned QR Codes / Barcodes on history.  Barcode Scanner allows you to view detailed product information at stores, supermarkets, ....  Enable flashlight feature for a darkness environment.  Save and Share QR code or Barcode.   The QR code scanner can saves and shares code you just encrypted.  QR code generator / QR code maker / QR code creator.  Barcode reader app.  Generate QR Code.  Generate Barcode.  QR code scanner app.
